about_the_game:
After spending weeks grinding an otome game in pursuit of its hidden yuri route, a freak accident transports Erika into the body of the game's antagonist: the evil void witch, Queen Esmeralda.

Erika quickly realizes the gruesome situation that she's in. The fact is that every single route she played in the game has led to the witch's death, starting from the moment when the heroine falls in love with one of her protectors, the Heart Knights.

"But what if the princess doesn't fall for one of her knights?"

For the sake of self-preservation, Erika must adopt the role of Queen Esmeralda, her polar opposite, and seduce the heroine for herself, all while fending off otome stereotypes and trying to find a way back home.



  • Immerse yourself in a world where you are the infamous “Evil Queen”.
  • Influence the narrative with different seduction strategies – be forceful, passive, or a mixture of both.
  • Multiple endings determined by your seduction style, and characters remember your choices as well!
  • Experience Live2D artworks, featuring beautifully crafted animations that enhance CG scenes!(optional)

'Let's Seduce the Heroine!' is a yuri-centric visual novel where your seduction tactics hold the key to survival. Can you overturn the inevitable and prevail, or will you meet the same tragic end as the witch?

content_descriptors.notes: Contains innuendo and crass humor relating to seduction techniques, plus romantic sensuality. Viewer discretion is advised.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu/SteamOS
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.4
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

name: Let's Seduce the Heroine!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

short_description: A girl is reincarnated into the villainess of an otome game. In order to avoid her scripted demise, she realizes she has to seduce the heroine! A yuri visual novel with a twist.
